targets.expr:
inbound_rtp_packetsLost{pageUrl="$pageUrl", peerConnectionId=~"$peerConnectionId", kind="audio"}
/ (inbound_rtp_packetsLost{pageUrl="$pageUrl", peerConnectionId=~"$peerConnectionId", kind="audio"} + inbound_rtp_packetsReceived{pageUrl="$pageUrl", peerConnectionId=~"$peerConnectionId", kind="audio"})

inbound_rtp_packetsLost{pageUrl="$pageUrl", peerConnectionId=~"$peerConnectionId", kind="video"}
/ (inbound_rtp_packetsLost{pageUrl="$pageUrl", peerConnectionId=~"$peerConnectionId", kind="video"} + inbound_rtp_packetsReceived{pageUrl="$pageUrl", peerConnectionId=~"$peerConnectionId", kind="video"})
